section.heading: Chief Financial Officer guidance.
section.text: For the preparation of the financial analysis required by § 47-4701(b)(1)(F) and the annual certification required by § 47-4702, the Chief Financial Officer shall set forth guidance regarding the collection of information necessary to implement these sections.
